verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Daivatanayaa kristhunadhundaa Ayyaa Papulakai pranamichitivaa devude ninu pampinadaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Papulakai vachchinaavaa papulanu karuninchinavaa Praanadanamu chesinavaa devaa paralokamu terachinavaa{/lang-eng}
